descriptions.work: Graded assignments, proctored exams and managed slides for Introduction to Algorithms 430 coursework.
Taught algorithms and cleared doubts in recitation classroom to 40 + students.
Experienced Technologies: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Spring, AngularJS, Hibernate, SQL, Bootstrap.

Reduced hard paper work requirement of client universities to 60% by creating online documents management system.
Built a system allows admin to create registration forms for university programs to enroll 10,000 plus eligible students in courses for upcoming semesters.
Migrated data from clients old PHP application to new centralized application university using Async tasks.
Aided company in cost-cutting by removing dependency of system from google authentication services and shifted application authentication to spring security.
Collaborated in 20 people team to develop web application eases performance review of employees based on set metrics in organization quarterly, half yearly or yearly.
Designed backend data filters for pagination to work on all entities on basis of 30 + common attribute.
Learned about Telecommunication Networks, Fiber-Optics, Communication Technologies, Mobile Communication, Broadband Technologies, and Intelligent Networks.
